website_summaries.verdict: Though it may not be strong enough for those with powerful swings, this chipping net stands out because it's ready to use soon after you open the box. It's also affordable and ideal for quick practice sessions in your backyard.
pros: A budget-friendly net that's suitable for light practice
We like the 3-ring target imprint for added focus when it comes to practicing various swings
Easy to use and set up
cons: Not ideal for serious or frequent practice swings because the netting has been known to tear from the Velcro attachment system

customer_reviews.title: Picture is very deceiving, photos added for true look.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t look like the picture, the net is very loosely attached and there’s no way to adjust it any tighter. The legs look sturdy but in reality flimsy with no adjustments as well. Conclusion, the material, make and look are well below what you pay for. Definitely stay away from this chipping net, you’ll have better chances with others.
customer_reviews.author: David Chang

customer_reviews.title: It’s cut some strokes from my game!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this handy little chipping net for 2 years before writing my review. And this thing takes a beating and is still as good as the day I bought it. I use real golf balls with it, chip about 50 balls/per day at it (I don’t hit that many into the net, to be very clear! I’m no pro!), and it often just sits in the yard under the sun. I put it up in the winter, but otherwise, it’s out and ready to go each day. This daily routine gives me a high degree of comfort around the green and has cut no less than 5 strokes from my game. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Spiff333

customer_reviews.title: Just enough
customer_reviews.text: This does the trick the netting feels a bit cheap that’s the only reason I didn’t give it a 5 But it’s light and convenient. If it last through the summer I will be happy.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Perez

customer_reviews.title: Awesome chipping net
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase. The first one I purchased was six years ago from Academy. The price at Academy had increased so I bought this one from Amazon. The net from the first one I purchased is still good but sun over time destroyed the rubber that holds the legs. It’s sturdy and easy to fold and carry wherever you need to take it. I have used it in the backyard, garage, park and on the chipping area at my course with actual golf balls. I use a chipping mat in the garage and sometimes in the backyard. It will definitely help you improve your chipping with practice.
customer_reviews.author: kappaman82

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Solidly built. Great price. Quick delivery. Fun! After only 10-20 balls I became more fluid and accurate chipping with real balls and also hitting a 9ir with practice balls at full swing. Love it. Have a chipping/hitting map coming and a wedge set, so I can't wait to set up the whole rig. It folds up small, like a junior camp chair, with ease. Also, each target hole has its own closed net, so it's easy when you retrieve balls to see which hit the bulls-eye, which hit inside the yellow, and which hit in the outer, black ring. Pretty cool.
customer_reviews.author: Billy

customer_reviews.title: Very nice! Get this one.
customer_reviews.text: I bought for my son for his birthday (33 y). He immediately set it up and he and his father-in-law played with it for hours. I thought it was a super quality for the price. So I bought another one for my grandson (9y).
customer_reviews.author: windy22TX

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup and good size for chipping practice
customer_reviews.text: It couldn't be any easier to open and use. It's very light weight, but sturdy and so far has worked out well hitting a couple of hundred balls into it. The netting seems a bit light weight (like a slightly heavier mosquito netting) so I'm a bit concerned it my tear, but so far it has been fine. I use it at a maximum distance of 20 yards and it's a perfect size target. I like the 3 different size rings as well to see how accurate your shot was.
customer_reviews.author: py6125

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for golfers!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. It is so easy to pull out of the shed or garage and chip any time. Super fun to play with my kids and a great way to work in my game. Perfect gift for your golf lover in your life.
customer_reviews.author: C.t.

customer_reviews.title: Gift went over big! Loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this so much, that he bought one for his dad. He uses it once a week and believes it helps his game. Nice quality and easy storage too. Went for the big one and so glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: Kalin

customer_reviews.title: Great for backyard chipping practice
customer_reviews.text: With a fairly large size yard I set up 3 of these nets to practice chipping from different angles and distances. They come ready to use and simply have to be extended out and set. They are stable and by keeping a handful of golf balls in the net it stays upright in higher winds.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: A great indoor chipping aid during the winter months
customer_reviews.text: I've really enjoyed this - I set it up in the basement over the cold winter and have been able to get in a lot of chipping practice. I've given it a four because I've had to fix the netting on the largest/outside basket - as a non-fantastic golfer, I hit the outside basket the most, and it has developed a few holes along the seams. Nothing a few zip ties can't fix, but a little annoying nonetheless. For the price, though (plus a few 1 cent zip ties), it's worked well.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan D.

customer_reviews.title: Golfer Must Have
customer_reviews.text: Must have for any golfer. I have been using this in the living room each night for 10-15 minutes. It is amazing how quickly that translated to the course. I worked out a ton of kinks chipping into this, and it actually made it fun.
customer_reviews.author: C&T-Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made, much better similar products available
customer_reviews.text: Product is cheaply made. The net hangs loosely and golf balls get easily tangled. The material is very lightweight and is easily knocked over by a light wind.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice size, lightweight, folds easily.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for practicing you chipping. It's lightweight, folds easily and is compact for easy storing. What I like best about it is the size. It's small and allows me to really focus in on the target area. When you miss it, you know you've overshot your target.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Tucker, Author

customer_reviews.title: Folds up easy.  Doesn't stay completely open.
customer_reviews.text: I think mine is defective. I haven't put a single ball in it from 25yds. A forcefield perhaps? It is built well enough. Seems like it will last. The funny thing is that at the moment, from not hitting my target, I feel like I have less confidence in my short game. The collapsible ring that folds does not have any kind of a clasp to hold it firmly open. It always wants to fold a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Otto56

customer_reviews.title: Buy two. Best backyard game you can play`
customer_reviews.text: 2 people, 3 balls each. Center worth 3, middle 2, outer 1. First to 21 wins. You can handicap players by letting them chip from closer or further away. Have spent countless hours playing this in the backyard!
customer_reviews.author: golfpilot

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: This is the exact same net that is sold at sporting goods stores for $30 and up. It collapses well and is a useful tool for golf practice. Note that this is not a small item, even collapsed it's about 2 feet tall and approximately six inches in diameter so it's not going to fit in your pocket!
customer_reviews.author: Cara

customer_reviews.title: Excellent home practice device
customer_reviews.text: The short game is where you either lose money, or take people's money. I prefer the latter. This is a great practice device with a graduated reward system. I recommend it, because I recommend taking other people's money in a game of golf.
customer_reviews.author: CHollrah

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply Made, but it does Get the Job Done.
customer_reviews.text: The mesh material gets tangled very easily, and it constantly wants to fold back in. It does not come out completely as the advertisement indicates. However it does work good enough to just give you a target to shoot at with your chip shots.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: I wasn't sure this was a good choice for a Christmas present for my golf playing ...
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure this was a good choice for a Christmas present for my golf playing hubby until I read the reviews by other consumers. My hubby really has enjoyed the target and launching pad suggested by other users. He stated that the practice has improved his short game. I am glad he has enjoyed the gift. Thanks to the reviews by the previous consumers. I was able to make a good choice.
customer_reviews.author: Steeler Fan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!  High quality.  Folds up like a chair easy to store in trunk.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely recommend. I am a beginner golfer so this is going to help a ton I bet. I got a mat and some practice balls on the way and I should be good to go!
customer_reviews.author: Troy

customer_reviews.title: Chipping net
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift. It is light and easy to open up. We bought two. My husband and sons love them.
customer_reviews.author: R. L. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Price
customer_reviews.text: It was on sale for 9$ so I bout it and came the next day. It is perfect size for chipping, taking to golf course. It feels pretty sturdy and doesn't feel cheap even though it is cheap. Pros: Cheap, Perfect size, sturdy, Cons: the only thing i have isn't about the net itself it's the price meaning it will change every day some days it is 9$ next it is 14$ or sometimes 20$ so I would wait till it is 9$ or prob 14$
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken out of the box!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the product and took out of packaging and was damaged!! Would be great if there was quality control with this. Don’t recommend buying or at least completely check upon arrival.
customer_reviews.author: fj07

customer_reviews.title: Can Improve Your Chipping
customer_reviews.text: If you are like me (and probably most golfers) touch around the green with chipping and pitching is a difficult thing to control. Putting this little practice net at various distances does help you work on your short game 'touch'. Even though most of the balls don't land in the net, it still helps to have a target. And if you get good enough to start hitting the net consistently, you don't have to bend over to pick of loose balls all over the yard.
customer_reviews.author: Allen Derwent

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS GIFT & COMPANY!
customer_reviews.text: I got to this chipping net for my boyfriend's birthday. It's perfect for anyone who is wanting to work on their game and are new to golf. But, this company went above and beyond for me. They made sure I got my gift on time even when I asked if they could do it quickly and we're just fantastic. Thank you so much J&M Golf!
customer_reviews.author: Trisha Betts

customer_reviews.title: Not only a great net - lightweight but sturdy - it is set ...
customer_reviews.text: Not only a great net - lightweight but sturdy - it is set up in such a way where you can aim for a couple of different spots within the net, and not just one mouth
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Brother loves it
customer_reviews.text: As a golfer I knew this would be the perfect gift for my brother and was surprised what i got for the price. If i were to buy this again I would get a larger size for the size of my back yard but a medium to small backyard would fit its size perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Antonino Carollo

customer_reviews.title: Great net!  Easy to setup and store!
customer_reviews.text: Great chipping net. Super easy to use! Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: JMN

customer_reviews.title: Hard to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my dad and he had an extremely hard time hitting the target. I also had to pay for shipping back.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Moore

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Gift
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my boyfriend for his birthday. He is obsessed with golf and is constantly hitting golf balls in the house. I decided I wanted to save our walls so I bought this. He uses it constantly and is very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Tasha

customer_reviews.title: Husband enjoys
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. Loves that it folds away. Easy to use. Dutiable
customer_reviews.author: Barrie Adkins

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected, otherwise good product.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product, it is smaller than I expected (I'll admit I didn't bother to look at dimensions in the description). Perfect for my dad to put in the backyard for days he cant make it to the course or to play with the grandkids and get them interested in golf..
customer_reviews.author: MamaBear

customer_reviews.title: Diameter and sturdiness just right
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and large enough to use anywhere (in the house). Retail stores had same item for 34.99 while this one was 19.99. Folds down easily and will know in a week or two if it's helped my game.
customer_reviews.author: BrnD

customer_reviews.title: Golfer Love
customer_reviews.text: I bought both my husband and my son one and they love it. Be sure to get the plastic golf balls for inside the house 😳
customer_reviews.author: Miranda Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great practice tool!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect practice chipping net...very durable and light, easy to move around. One can practice the short game anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Mary E. Jollon

customer_reviews.title: Seriously improved my game
customer_reviews.text: After using this in the back yard for a few hours, my pitching wedge is by far my best club in the bag.
customer_reviews.author: mpyers

customer_reviews.title: easy to put away when not in use and light ...
customer_reviews.text: A gift for my husband. We live in the country a bit far form a golf course, and he uses it in different areas to practice different shots. Bonus--the cat gets exercise chasing balls that do not make the net. Well constructed, easy to put away when not in use and light and easy to move around.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Quite the steal. Compare at 3x price at golf ...
customer_reviews.text: Quite the steal. Compare at 3x price at golf specific websites. Collapses down to a tiny footprint. Just gotta practice. That's what its for.
customer_reviews.author: japhakrfnb

customer_reviews.title: perfect gift for golfer
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a golfer but my husband and daughter are....i was hesitant when i opened the package but the Chipping Net was pretty nice. My daughter is only 7 and she said it was perfect ...not sure how you can trust her judgement but most kids are smarter than adults...lol
customer_reviews.author: Qu33nM3LL

customer_reviews.title: Good target size and quite convenient fold-up feature.
customer_reviews.text: Good target size and quite convenient fold-up feature. I use this indoors and chipping practice is fun with the three different pockets. Quality seems to be good--it's holding up well so far--this is much sturdier that the previous folding chipping net I had . Definitely recommend this for those looking for a good chipping net.
customer_reviews.author: Proud father

customer_reviews.title: Everything as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The net was not as tight as i would have liked, it was a bit dangly but it is easy to fix. Comes just as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Arevalo

customer_reviews.title: Good training tool.
customer_reviews.text: Of course I don't regularly hit the ball in the target, but it is helping.
customer_reviews.author: marv

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful target for indoor practice!
customer_reviews.text: It reliably holds up. The metal construction is a boon for balls that miss the net (this IS practice after all!). The design is easily foldable, on the order of a camp chair. You could empty a shag bag into this and it would still hold up—great for grooving your stroke without having to get your dozen balls back.
customer_reviews.author: Joeybreezes

customer_reviews.title: Very good buy
customer_reviews.text: Great buy. Use it for practice and found it to be very useful
customer_reviews.author: tino

customer_reviews.title: I like it but I'm not sure how long it will ...
customer_reviews.text: I like it but I'm not sure how long it will last. My golf instructor has one and the netting rips away from the velcro attachments. Of course, his is used significantly more than mine.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Nice little chipping net
customer_reviews.text: Nice little chipping net. Only downside is it doesn't lock in place well. It hasn't collapsed on me at all, but it would be nice to have some sort of mechanism to help hold it open at the appropriate width.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Golf lovers love it !
customer_reviews.text: Amazing buy !!! I always think about the best gifts possible for Christmas and this won a standing ovation ! Will recommend!
customer_reviews.author: IntegrityMomma

customer_reviews.title: Been a very helpful product and love how well it stows
customer_reviews.text: Been a very helpful product and love how well it stows. I have been using this all around my yard and even for storing my dogs toys when im mowing the lawn. Therefore this is not just a single use item! Can be used all around the house hold whether your chipping in the house or cleaning up the house.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Easy to fold. Easy to setup.
customer_reviews.text: It folds up nice and tight. It folds out quick and is ready to go. Came in a vent box with just packing paper in it but I saw no signs of damage. It looks like it will be playable for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Nice design
customer_reviews.text: Not super collapsible, about the size of a folding chair, but it is a nice design and well made. I like that it is set up off the ground a little bit to make chipping more realistic.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Polatty

customer_reviews.title: The circles aren't tight like some other reviews stated
customer_reviews.text: Works well for intended use. The circles aren't tight like some other reviews stated. But that has zero effect on using the net. Learn to hit better chip shots. Worth a buy for someone looking for a inexpensive way to practice at home.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the garden
customer_reviews.text: A great, easy to use, collapsable golf net to use in the garden. Perfect for practicing your short game. I would recommend this product to any golfer wishing to improve at home.
customer_reviews.author: Seb Miller

customer_reviews.title: Easy to open/close
customer_reviews.text: Saw some reviews stating that the item was junk. See nothing wrong in my opinion. Easy to open/close. Appears to me some people couldn't send a positive review if they got it for free.
customer_reviews.author: randall leopper

customer_reviews.title: This is a lot of fun and something the whole family has been using to ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a lot of fun and something the whole family has been using to better our golf game.
customer_reviews.author: Billie

customer_reviews.title: Good Price, Good Item
customer_reviews.text: There are no complaints for this item. It is as described and was a well received gift.
customer_reviews.author: Mallory McKeegan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for gifting!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for the back yard, camping, anything!! I bought this for my boyfriend (yes I was a bit sceptical), but he LOVES it and his friends are jealous!! Win-win!!
customer_reviews.author: Miss. K

customer_reviews.title: Fun to use and improved my short game
customer_reviews.text: Been using the net for well over a year, and it works great. Produced noticeable improvement In my short game, and it's fun for groups during cookouts and cocktails. Normally being it inside, but I've left it out in the rain several times and I have not noticed any harm.
customer_reviews.author: HNR

customer_reviews.title: Perfect product and delivery
customer_reviews.text: Already have one, and bought another for a birthday gift for a good friend.
customer_reviews.author: Tom M.

customer_reviews.title: ... this to chip around the backyard and it works great. The fact that it is collapsible is convenient ...
customer_reviews.text: Been using this to chip around the backyard and it works great. The fact that it is collapsible is convenient and it has enough flex to leave balls in the pockets when storing.You can use the rings to determine how accurate your shots are. A good buddy of mine came over and we decided this would be a great golf version of beer bong or corn hole as you can measure accuracy.
customer_reviews.author: JS801

customer_reviews.title: Excellant training aid!
customer_reviews.text: Great training aid to low cost. Gives you something to target indoor and outdoor.
customer_reviews.author: x Ari x

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it, use it in my front yard all the time
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Loads of fun
customer_reviews.text: Really great practice tool. It is the off season right now and I actually have it set up in my basement to practice up to 20' chip shots. I love it!!! Also very sturdy & good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: VCG

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic purchase for any golf lover!
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend is a very happy man! Quality construction and easy to fold/take with us.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: performs as advertised
customer_reviews.text: showed immediate improvement when chipping with 56 and 60 degree wedges. wish I had purchased it 2 years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Chester H. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Nice piece of equipment - easy to set-up and the ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice piece of equipment - easy to set-up and the price was right - great for getting your chipping stroke down but have no idea of how far the ball will roll out - more for target practice but fun to use for that purpose.
customer_reviews.author: NC flyguy 73

customer_reviews.title: Good Low Cost Item
customer_reviews.text: I like how it's folds up and it's seem pretty well built...just wish it was a little bigger (that's what she said). Or maybe I'll get better and not think that anymore! It doesn't seem to lock, but it stays open, for the cost happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MFOX

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift and he said it worked really well.
customer_reviews.author: JOEL MCMAHAN

customer_reviews.title: My husband received this as a gift and I wondered ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband received this as a gift and I wondered if he would actually use it. But here in AZ we don't have grass in our yard and he actually goes out there with a carpet scrap and practices his chipping. We also have used it as a game when we have company.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my boyfriend and he loves it. Well made and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Dash

customer_reviews.title: this chipping net is 10 times better than the other one i bought on amazon
customer_reviews.text: this chipping net is 10 times better than the other one i bought on amazon. Great price and a quality product.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to fold out and in and is light and sturdily made, although Ive only used it one time.

customer_reviews.title: Golfers will love this
customer_reviews.text: perfect and so easy to open and shut. just the right size to use indoors even in a hallway.
customer_reviews.author: kathy v

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny spent!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is VERY COOL!!! It’s super sturdy, a lot bigger then I expected, and so worth the cost! I tried finding this same thing at dicks sporting goods and it was almost 3 times the amount for A LOT smaller net! Great find and a great purchase for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simple, inexpensive, and effective. Occasionally balls get ...
customer_reviews.text: Simple, inexpensive, and effective. Occasionally balls get twisted around a bit in the netting and it will take me an extra 4.5 seconds to fish it out but I can live with it (golf hasn't become THAT lazy!)
customer_reviews.author: JonesyN

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for my Dad!
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my Dad and he loved it. Very easy to set up and looks exactly like the picture.

customer_reviews.title: Good product, sturdy construction
customer_reviews.text: Really nice product and well built. Some reviewers have rightfully stated that is does sit up off of the ground, but it is still a great practice took and is extremely portable. Well built and highly recommended product.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this works great as a chipping target and very low price.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Great chipping net! Very sturdy and solid at such a great price too
customer_reviews.author: MARK S

customer_reviews.title: Great indoors and out
customer_reviews.text: I love unwinding after a long day with a few beers and hitting a few styrofoam balls while inside the house! Great for working on your chip game.
customer_reviews.author: Scoggpod

customer_reviews.title: Happy husband
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for Christmas. It appears to be well made and folds up nicely for storage. My husband loves it and has been practicing in the house with foam balls. He can't wait for warm weather so he can take it outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: megan

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and folds easy
customer_reviews.text: Shipped fast, came assembled. fold out and chipped away. Doesn't move a round when you hit it. Forgot and left out in the rain a couple of times... not a big deal. I'll bring it in after the season.
customer_reviews.author: Chris R.

customer_reviews.title: Chipping Net
customer_reviews.text: This is a great practice tool that does exactly what was promised in the product description. It is light weight, collapsible, and takes up almost no space in my garage when I'm storing it. Now all I have to do is learn to hit the target.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Timmerman

customer_reviews.title: But its what is necessary to be a GREAT Golfer!
customer_reviews.text: Neat Item! Little Pricey.. But its what is necessary to be a GREAT Golfer!!!

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not nearly as large as I had imagined! Nevertheless, useful

customer_reviews.text: Everyone in my family loves to play golf. I bought this for my children (myself too) to practice chipping. Perfect!

customer_reviews.text: Works well for entertainment, as far as improving my golf game...that's still to be determined.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It has help my chipping game a lot. Can be used inside and outside.

customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this! Bought it for him as a gift and he was very surprised. Great quality, sturdy, and will last for quite a while.

customer_reviews.title: Fun item.
customer_reviews.text: We have had so much fun with this net. It is not only lightweight and portable, but durable too!

customer_reviews.title: This was purchased for my husband as a gift. ...
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for my husband as a gift. It is as described and has held up well. He has used it several times.

customer_reviews.title: it would be better with clips around the edge
customer_reviews.text: it can't be fully open. it would be better with clips around the edge.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Cool net that's light and portable. Fun for serious practice or goofing w friends . Opens / closes w ease and is great quality

customer_reviews.title: Not of the....
customer_reviews.text: Not of the best quality but worth the investment to improve my golf game.

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great practice tool at a reasonable price. It really helped with my short game.
customer_reviews.author: Minny

customer_reviews.title: Very great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous about the quality for the price. When it arrived I was blown away. Product is even better in person it even made me want to try out golf.
customer_reviews.author: Ally Jeske

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Very portable. I would add color to the outer ring.

customer_reviews.title: Great training tool.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this. Wish it was a bit bigger.

product_meta.title: JEF WORLD OF GOLF Collapsible Chipping Net
feature_bullets: Sharpen your skills with the ultimate folding chipping basket
Converts from a 23-inch diameter frame into a 7-inch diameter frame
Features 3 chipping baskets for the ultimate challenge
Great for left or right handed golfers
